languages.text: В недрах улья обитает Развалина — жуткое существо, сшитое из множества тел и заправляющее машинами боли. Пришло время остановить его злодеяния против протектората Вольного Торговца и самого Человечества.

traits.locale_text: В недрах улья обитает Крушитель — жуткое существо, сшитое из множества тел и заправляющее машинами боли. Пришло время остановить его злодеяния против торговой империи Вольного Торговца и самого Человечества.

languages.text: A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's protectorate and Humanity itself.
languages.original_text: В недрах улья обитает Развалина — жуткое существо, сшитое из множества тел и заправляющее машинами боли. Пришло время остановить его злодеяния против протектората Вольного Торговца и самого Человечества.

traits.locale_text: A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's empire and Humanity itself.

A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's empire and Humanity itself.

A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's empire and Humanity itself.

A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's protectorate and Humanity itself.

languages.text: 巢都内部居住着一只可怕的怪物——凌虐者。凌虐者由无数尸体拼接而成，负责操作隐藏在这个世界深处的痛苦引擎。如今，必须将它彻底消灭，让它为对行商浪人的王朝与人类犯下的罪行付出代价。
languages.original_text: A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's protectorate and Humanity itself.

traits.locale_text: 巢都内部居住着一只可怕的怪物——凌虐者。凌虐者由无数尸体拼接而成，负责操作隐藏在这个世界深处的痛苦引擎。如今，必须将它彻底消灭，让它为对行商浪人的王朝与人类犯下的罪行付出代价。

languages.text: 恐ろしい生き物 — ラックがハイヴのはらわたに住みついている。無数の遺体を縫い合わせたラックは、惑星の奥深くでエンジン・オブ・ペインをふかしている。自由開拓者の保護領と人類に対する犯罪に終止符を打つ時が来た。
languages.original_text: A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's protectorate and Humanity itself.

traits.locale_text: 恐ろしい生き物 — ラックがハイヴのはらわたに住みついている。無数の遺体を縫い合わせたラックは、惑星の奥深くでエンジン・オブ・ペインをふかしている。自由開拓者の保護領と人類に対する犯罪に終止符を打つ時が来た。

languages.text: Una criatura horrenda habita en las entrañas de la colmena: el Atormentado. Cosido a partir de incontables cadáveres, opera un Motor del Dolor en las profundidades del mundo. Es hora de poner fin a sus crímenes contra el protectorado de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y contra la misma Humanidad.
languages.original_text: A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's protectorate and Humanity itself.

traits.locale_text: Una criatura horrenda habita en las entrañas de la colmena: el Atormentado. Cosido a partir de incontables cadáveres, opera un Motor del Dolor en las profundidades del mundo. Es hora de poner fin a sus crímenes contra el protectorado de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y contra la misma Humanidad.

languages.text: Eine schreckliche Kreatur lauert in den Eingeweiden des Makropole ... der Folterer. Der aus zahllosen Körpern zusammengenähte Folterer bedient die Schmerzmaschine in den Tiefen der Welt. Es wird Zeit, seinen Verbrechen gegen das Protektorat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und die Menschheit selbst ein Ende zu machen.
languages.original_text: A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's protectorate and Humanity itself.

traits.locale_text: Eine schreckliche Kreatur lauert in den Eingeweiden des Makropole ... der Folterer. Der aus zahllosen Körpern zusammengenähte Folterer bedient die Schmerzmaschine in den Tiefen der Welt. Es wird Zeit, seinen Verbrechen gegen das Protektorat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und die Menschheit selbst ein Ende zu machen.

languages.text: Une créature cauchemardesque est tapie dans les boyaux de la ruche : la Gorgone. Constituée d'innombrables corps cousus ensemble, la Gorgone opère une machine de tourment au plus profond de ce monde. Il est temps de mettre un terme aux crimes perpétrés à l'encontre du protectorat {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et de l'humanité tout entière.
languages.original_text: A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's protectorate and Humanity itself.

traits.locale_text: Une créature cauchemardesque est tapie dans les boyaux de la ruche : la Gorgone. Constituée d'innombrables corps cousus ensemble, la Gorgone opère une machine de tourment au plus profond de ce monde. Il est temps de mettre un terme aux crimes perpétrés à l'encontre du protectorat {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et de l'humanité tout entière.

languages.text: Kovanın iç kısımlarında dehşet verici bir yaratık kol geziyor: Harap. Sayısız cesedin birbirine dikilmesiyle ortaya çıkan Harap, dünyanın derinliklerinde bir Acı Motoru işletiyor. Hür Tacir'in protektorasına ve direkt olarak İnsanlığa karşı işlediği suçlara son verme zamanı geldi.
languages.original_text: A horrifying creature dwells in the bowels of the hive — the Wrack. Stitched together from countless bodies, the Wrack operates an Engine of Pain deep within the world. It is time to put an end to its crimes against the Rogue Trader's protectorate and Humanity itself.

traits.locale_text: Kovanın iç kısımlarında dehşet verici bir yaratık kol geziyor: Yıkıntı. Sayısız cesedin birbirine dikilmesiyle ortaya çıkan Harap, dünyanın derinliklerinde bir Acı Motoru işletiyor. Hür Tacir'in protektorasına ve direkt olarak İnsanlığa karşı işlediği suçlara bir son verme zamanı.
